noun.name: bowl
noun.discription: a common household item used for serving food

object1.name: vase
object1.discription: in parallel with 'bowl', is a decorative container often used for holding flowers

object2.name: plate
object2.discription: in parallel with 'bowl', is a flat dish used for serving individual portions of food

object3.name: cup
object3.discription: in parallel with 'bowl', is a small, open-top container used for drinking liquids

object4.name: jug
object4.discription: in parallel with 'bowl', is a large container with a handle and spout, used for holding and pouring liquids

object5.name: tray
object5.discription: in parallel with 'bowl', is a flat, shallow surface used for carrying items or serving food

object6.name: pot
object6.discription: in parallel with 'bowl', is a container used for cooking or serving food, often with a handle and lid

object7.name: basket
object7.discription: in parallel with 'bowl', is a container made of interwoven material, used for carrying or holding items

object8.name: dish
object8.discription: in parallel with 'bowl', is a shallow, flat container used for serving food, often part of a set
